actions.committee: Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

official_title: A bill to amend Section 104 of the River and Harbor Act of 1958, Public Law 85-500 as amended, to increase the annual funding authority for the Aquatic Plant Control Program.

summary.text: Amends the River and Harbor Acts of 1958 and 1965 to increase the annual funding authority for aquatic plant control.

titles.title: A bill to amend Section 104 of the River and Harbor Act of 1958, Public Law 85-500 as amended, to increase the annual funding authority for the Aquatic Plant Control Program.
